suggest.amasty/module-pre-order-graphql: Install module-pre-order-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Pre Order integration.
suggest.amasty/module-preorder-mftf-2: Install preorder-mftf-2 module to be able to run Preorder MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version
suggest.amasty/module-preorder-mftf-3: Install preorder-mftf-3 module to be able to run Preorder MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
suggest.amasty/module-preorder-to-builder: Install Amasty_PreorderToBuilder module to activate the integration with Custom Reports Builder extension and create valuable reports about your preorders.
